appetizers.name: French Fries
appetizers.description: Deep fried to perfection, our fries go perfectly with any meal. Size large for easy sharing.

appetizers.name: Mozzarella Sticks
appetizers.description: Creamy mozzarella cheeze, breaded, seasoned, and deepfried. Served with house marinara.

cold sandwiches.name: Turkey Club Sandwich
cold sandwiches.description: Fresh, house made turkey club sandwich tailored to your exact preferences

cold sandwiches.name: Italian Combo
cold sandwiches.description: Selection of hand-crafted meats featured in a traditional Italian deli sandwich

hot sandwiches.name: Meatball Sub
hot sandwiches.description: Hot, fresh meatballs covered in house marinara covered in marinara on your choice of bread

hot sandwiches.name: Monte Cristo
hot sandwiches.description: House Specialty: Traditional Monte Cristo with ham and cheese served over french toast

desserts.name: Cheese Cake
desserts.description: Rich and creamy, this traditional New York cheese cake will truly amaze.

desserts.name: Fried Oreos
desserts.description: The perfect mixture of sweet and savory to finish any meal. Must Try!

drinks.name: Fountain Drink
drinks.description: refreshing and cool, choose from the following: coke, sprite, rootbeer, gingerale, orange soda, grape soda.

drinks.name: Arnold Palmer
drinks.description: A classic drink for any season
